entry.title: Sobriquet
entry.summary:
Author: rainbowninja167

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,434Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 167

Summary: "I like the name 'Eddie.' Edmundo is too long for a firefighter. There’s no time for three syllables when you’re running through a burning building. By the time we got to the ‘do,’ the ceiling would be collapsed on top of you or something."“Like I’m really gonna take nickname advice from Buck Buckley." Or: 5 Times Buck Called Eddie by a Nickname + 1 Time He Didn’t

entry.title: If I Let It Hurt
entry.summary:
Author: inkandschaos

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,208Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: After Bobby's death fractures the centre of his world, Buck finds himself unraveling beneath the weight of loss, memory, and all the people who left before. With Frank’s steady presence and Eddie’s return, Buck begins the painful process of untangling grief from abandonment—and starts to ask the harder question: what does it mean to be chosen, to stay, to heal, when everything inside him aches to run?Or Buck goes to therapy - a lot

entry.title: best friends, ex-friends 'til the end (better off as lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: drakesword

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,306Chapters: 4/40Kudos: 11

Summary: A lot of things are gay at this school, Eddie has noticed. It’s not necessarily a new phenomenon, but back in elementary school, that word was only ever hushed, giggled over, never dared to be said in front of the teachers, in fear of being scolded.Here, however, it’s shouted down hallways, said out loud in classrooms, written on blackboards, thrown at the heads of kids who dare to express themselves in the wrong way.So yeah, no thanks. Eddie would rather not approach, or even look at anyone with something remotely close to a social life at this school again. He doesn’t want to make himself a target.Because if there is one thing people should know about him, it’s this: Eddie Diaz is not gay. Or; AU where Buck and Eddie meet in middle school and quickly become best friends. But is that really all they are?

entry.title: Constellations of Survival: A Map of Scars and Stories
entry.summary:
Author: James3b

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,296Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 91

Summary: Evan "Buck" Buckley’s birthmarks have always drawn unwanted attention—from his parents’ quiet shame to childhood bullies, dismissive dates, judgmental strangers, and even panicked victims. Each encounter chips away at his confidence, leaving him torn between self-consciousness and defiance. But when a cruel insult during a high-stakes rescue finally cracks his resolve, it’s Eddie Diaz who steps in, fierce and unyielding, to rewrite the narrative. With the unwavering support of his 118 family—Bobby’s quiet pride, Hen’s silent solidarity, Chimney’s knowing glances, and Christopher’s adoring crayon tribute—Buck learns that his birthmarks aren’t flaws to hide. They’re proof of survival, a roadmap of resilience, and a testament to the people who love every part of him, spots and all.

entry.title: Ghosts in the Room
entry.summary:
Author: Santaslovechild

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,677Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 101

Summary: When Margaret and Phillip Buckley rush to Los Angeles after their son Evan is injured, they expect to find the same isolated, reckless boy they’d spent years keeping at arm’s length.Instead, they’re confronted with the vibrant life he’s built without them: a firehouse captain who knows his coffee order by heart, a police sergeant who bakes his favorite muffins, a man and his son who call Buck family, and a sister who’s found love in a world they never bothered to ask about.As the 118 crew—and the life Buck forged from blood, saltwater, and ash—fill his hospital room with proof of belonging, his parents realize their absence left scars deeper than any injury.A post-6x10 fic about the family Buck chose, the ghosts of the one he didn’t, and the quiet tragedy of being strangers to the person you were supposed to love first.

entry.title: Five Times It Was (Definitely) Platonic (And One Time It Wasn’t)
entry.summary:
Author: Color0me

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,724Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 130

Summary: Eddie Diaz is a rational man. So what if he’s kissed his best friend Buck five separate times? The grocery store debacle was just a harmless lie to dodge a nosy parent. The zoo? A churro-induced thank-you. Movie night? Buck deserved to be shut up during The Notebook. The fire station forehead kiss? Pure superstition. And the coffee-fueled doorstep moment? A fluke. Totally platonic. All of it.Except Christopher Diaz, certified genius and chaos gremlin, isn’t buying it—and neither is the entire 118 crew, who’ve placed bets on how long it’ll take these idiots to figure themselves out. When Buck shows up for their science museum trip only to be ambushed by Eddie’s panicked confession, the sixth kiss changes everything. No lies, no jokes, just Buck’s hands in Eddie’s shirt and the glorious, mortifying sound of Hen whooping from the group chat.Or the mortifying ordeal of being known—especially when your kid has been rooting for your relationship since day one.

entry.title: All the quiet places
entry.summary:
Author: sageevreeen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,045Chapters: 5/50Kudos: 56

Summary: New walls, old ghosts. Buck is trying to settle into a house that once felt like home, but the silence that follows him is heavier than the boxes he’s unpacking. A fight left words unsaid and distance that keeps stretching. He tells himself he’s fine, that distractions are enough. But some nights are quieter than others—and some silences cut deeper than they should. Or, Buck kisses Eddie before he leaves for El Paso. Buck struggles, falling into unhealthy coping mechanisms, and Eddie comes back to take care of him. Eventually, they find their way to each other—there’s a proposal, a wedding, and a promise that sticks.

entry.title: Best Brother
entry.summary:
Author: BonBon_6161

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,365Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 109

Summary: “May, why are you calling me at 2 in the morning?” He tried to speak quietly since Eddie was sleeping right next to him.“Heyyyyyy Buck,” Her speech was a bit slurred, and he could tell she was drunk.“Are you okay?”“No, there is some guy here who won’t leave me alone, and when I told him I would call my brother, who's a Navy SEAL he laughed.” - Buck being May's big brother

entry.title: I Don’t See Your Mistakes
entry.summary:
Author: fruitsdoesnotknow

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,087Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 89

Summary: “You can share with Buck!” Chris yells at him behind the closed door, and Eddie stares at the chipped white paint on the frame, shaking his head as his heart thumps heavily. “Share what?” Buck yells back, same inflection, and Eddie shakes his head again, just as indulgently. He missed this. He traces a hand over one of the framed pictures on the wall, of Jee and Maddie, then to another of Christopher with abuela, and his heart thumps a little louder. Buck’s humming to himself from the other room. There’s a loud clattering noise in the bathroom, like Chris knocked over a bunch of toiletries. Eddie really missed this. ***They're asked a simple question. "When did you fall in love with your partner?" This is how they respond.

entry.title: Too Close
entry.summary:
Author: NyxxTheWitch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,735Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 62

Summary: They found the child in a bedroom on the second floor, wedged behind a dresser and coughing up blood. Buck lifted her up carefully while Eddie cleared the path back down. There was a low groaning sound and a beam dropped behind them, the hallway swallowed in flames.“Go!” Eddie shouted. “Back through the window!”They wrapped the girl in Buck's jacket and smashed the bedroom window. Their team had already extended the aerial ladder towards the window, and they had no time to wait. Buck passes the young girl through the window and to the waiting firefighters.Eddie hesitated, watching Buck.“You next!” Buck barked. But Eddie was just…looking at him. Something in his chest shifted."Go," Buck orders again, his voice raw. Eddie didn't know if it was emotions or smoke inhalation making his voice sound rougher. "Don't you dare make me watch you die in here."

entry.title: What Do You Call A Gay Dinosaur? A Homosaurus Rex
entry.summary:
Author: SeanDR

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,136Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 28

Summary: After an altercation with Owen Grady gets his Security Partner reassigned, PaleoVet Evan 'Buck' Buckley gets a new S.P. in rookie Eddie Diaz. The two try to learn to get along all while sidestepping Grady, who has it out for BuckBut when the Indominus Rex breaks out right after they drop Eddie's son Chris off at a new camp on the island, the two must race to save Chris while dealing with their own feelings.Inspired by a fanart by @erosbuddie on Twitterhttps://x.com/erosbuddie/status/1892718287739331048?t=Us1b8Qy0emW3uBjOB8YgkA&s=19

entry.title: Extended Family In High Places
entry.summary:
Author: centeast

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,716Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 270

Summary: Eddie Diaz has just started at the 118 and is cousins to Alex and June Claremont Diaz, also known as the First Son of the United States and First Daughter of the United States. Eddie's relationship with his cousins are introduced to the 118 early on. Buck and Eddie's relationship grows throughout and an event in DC brings them together. Buck is welcomed into the extended family and everyone realizes they're regular people in high profile jobs.Starts around 911 Season 2 and follows the series as best we can. We'll also be following the RWRB book more than the movie, but some elements from the movie may slip in depending on the situation.This was inspired by our mutual adoration of 911 and Red, White and Royal Blue. Fans of 911 who are not aware of RWRB, we highly recommend reading the book and watching the movie. It is a cute rom-com book and the movie is good, too. And those RWRB fans, who do not know of 911, check it out! 6 seasons and still going strong. Although, we both have differing reasons as to why we watch. But you can blame Centeast for the RWRB fandom adoration! She introduced SapphireEJ when the book first came out!

entry.title: Little Do You Know
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,042Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 177

Summary: Post Lawsuit.Buck returns to the 118 and is basically invisible to the 118 for months. He plans to end his life but when Sam and Dean Winchester show up saying they have a lead in his husbands death, he puts his suicidal thoughts on hold, and takes off with the Winchesters to get revenge on the thing that killed his husband 5 years ago.But what happens when he forgot that he left a pre suicide scene at his apartment in the rush to leave? What happens when the 118 don’t know about his past life and have no idea what’s going on?

entry.title: Love Me Anyway
entry.summary:
Author: prettymucheverything

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,705Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: For 30-some odd years, Evan Buckley has felt unloved.Even before learning the fate of Daniel and the emotional baggage it left his parents with, he never truly felt what all his friends did; the glowing warm embrace his mother was supposed to provide.He never felt the connection and masculine bond he was supposed to experience with his father. He lacked that.The only person he ever felt any spark of love from was Maddie.Until Eddie changed his life.Edmundo Diaz, Eddie to most, was a glowing ray of sunshine in the darkest pits of hell, the warm breeze on a beautiful summer afternoon, the sweet taste of honey in peppermint tea.He was love personified, and Buck could feel every little bit of it. Or - After an eerily familiar call, Buck reflects on his past and his tendency to always end up alone. Eddie doesn't let him.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply

entry.title: Last Second Curves Toward a Horizontal Flight
entry.summary:
Author: mainstreamcatholicism

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,466Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 10

Summary: Bobby was a man of unfinished business. Chimney told her about the 148 people, 148 bodies, 148 reasons for him to never sit still or feel content in his physical form. Every day that business seems to grow. There’s a grocery pre-order delivered to the station the next day. A home, empty and growing colder as days slip past in a warm blur. His AA group had to find someone new last minute to host his usual speaking spot – no easy feat, when Bobby’s so interwoven into their recoveries no one can get more that 3 words out before sorrow bubbles out of them like soapy water.Even if the light came to him, Maddie doesn’t see him walking in unscathed.So if Bobby has unfinished business, if he has something keeping him from the light.Where the fuck is he?*Post 8x15 fix-it Ghost Whisperer AU
